fileName.description: File name where to add some template

snippet.description: Text to detect where to insert template

template.description: Test that should be inserted. Can use templated values.

position.description: Position where to add templte: Before snippet or after snippet.

type.description: Should workspace folder either selected folder to be used for generating code as source directory

path.description: Path to template folder either global or local to workspace

prompt.description: Text for prompt when variable is inputed

input.description: True (default) if varible should be inputed by user otherwise it will be calculated using other variables. If value equal false expression field is mandatory

expression.descripton: Used only when `input` = false. Javascript expression for calaculating variable. Expression can use other variables to calculate

actions.description: Actions that can be used after generating code like adding initialization to some file
